definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The Indian Ocean and sub-continent is a very big pie, China.
sentences.chinese: 印度洋和印度次大陆是一块非常大的蛋糕。

sentences.english: Eels are fast vanishing from Mediterranean , swordfish from the Indian Ocean .
sentences.chinese: 鳗鲡正从地中海快速消失，剑鱼正从印度洋消失。

sentences.english: An aerial view shows Male, the capital city of the Maldive Islands in the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 鸟瞰图显示凸形的，首都马尔代夫群岛在印度洋。

sentences.english: China a hasfinland-ized huge areas in the Indian and Pacific Ocean spheres.
sentences.chinese: 中国在印度洋和太平洋芬兰化了一大块地区。

sentences.english: Grand Mirage Resort is a beach resort with 309 rooms which most them overlooking to the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在酒店，您可以远眺美丽的山峦和印度洋的绝妙风光。

sentences.english: It will have a 1, 000-nautical-mile footprint over the Indian Ocean region.
sentences.chinese: 在印度洋地区，该卫星的足迹将会遍布1000海里。

sentences.english: So Equator East Pacific SSTA and the IOD have synergic effect.
sentences.chinese: 赤道东太平洋海温异常和印度洋偶极子有协同作用。

sentences.english: Only the US Navy operates such large vessels in the IndianOcean.
sentences.chinese: 只有美国海军在印度洋中运行这样的大型船只。

sentences.english: Zhenghe and his men made seven crossings on the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 郑和和他的手下人七次横渡印度洋。

sentences.english: Many voyages were made to the Indian Ocean during that period.
sentences.chinese: 这段时间很多人航海去印度洋。

sentences.english: Already, China and India are jostling for dominance, not least in the Indian Ocean and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 中国和印度在争夺主导权，尤其是在印度洋和非洲。

sentences.english: The island of Sri Lanka, lies within the Indian Ocean, with the Bay of Bengal to the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 斯里兰卡岛，位于印度洋内，东北边是孟加拉海湾。

sentences.english: If you look at the Indian Ocean, it's fascinating.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看一看印度洋，你就会迷上它。

sentences.english: They are voyaging across the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在作穿越印度洋的航行。

sentences.english: On Zheng He's first voyage, he set sail across the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在郑和航海时，他横渡了印度洋。

sentences.english: A region of southeast Africa on the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 印度洋边非洲东南部的一个地区。
